Stuck In The Flow
simple applications for smartphones and tablets, available for Android and Windows Phones systems.

Made for students, by students.

Apps to help you studying.

They could be useful to:

  • Perform regressions on some data.
  • Resolve linear algebra problems.
  • Analyze an isometry in a vector or Euclidean space.
  • Perfom all the basics and more frequent operations on matrixes.

Apps for your free time.

They could be useful to:

  • Relax after an intense study session.
  • Keep you busy on downtimes.
  • Challenge your friends.

Browse all our applications and learn more about them.
